mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lyrics from "Barney" children's TV show, a smiley face, Greek society initials. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
I love you, you love me | We're a happy family | with a great big hug & | a kiss from me to you | Won't you say you love me too?
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Television programs
Greek letter societies
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
